---
id: create-workspace
title: "Create workspace"
description: "Creates a new workspace in the organization identified by the given `orgId`. The requesting user is automatically added as an owner of the workspace."
sidebar_label: "Create workspace"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: platform-api//seqera-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create workspace"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/workspaces"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new workspace in the organization identified by the given `orgId`. The requesting user is automatically added as an owner of the workspace.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
